import React from 'react' import './Post.css' import Comment from '../../img/comment.png' import Share from '../../img/share.png' import Heart from '../../img/like.png' import NotLike from '../../img/notlike.png' const Post = ({data}) => { return (
{data.likes} likes
{data.name} {data.desc}
) } export default Post
